chapter.para: Save this file as TestExtension.py in the ~/.caja/python-extensions folder. You may need to create this folder. To run, open the terminal and type:
Once Caja starts, right-click on a file and you should see a new menu item, "Showing #filename#". It is as simple as that!

As mentioned above, in order to get loaded by Caja, a python extension must import the caja module, create a class derived from a caja *Provider, then create the methods that will be called by Caja when it requests information from its providers. In this case, when someone right-clicks on a file, Caja will ask all of its MenuProviders for additional menu items to show the user. When folders or files are clicked, the get_file_items method is called and a list of caja.MenuItems is expected.
